column1: A celebration of life service to honor this loving and dedicated Christian lady will be held 11 a.m. Tuesday
column3: 2015 at Rich Fork Baptist Church with the Rev. Michael Bowers officiating. Mrs. Kanoyï¿½s life exemplified her love for Jesus Christ
